attributes.name: Advanced 3 (Freestyle 4) - Thursday 5:45pm
attributes.description:
NOTE: There is a 30 minute warm-up before class.
Warm-up time: 5:45pm - 6:15pm
Class time: 6:15pm - 6:45pm

Advanced 3/ Freestyle 4 Third Advanced level skating class for ages 6-17

  1. Flip jump
  2. Loop jump
  3. Sit spin
  4. One-half loop jump
  5. Backward inside three-turns
  6. Backward inside spirals
  7. Backward outside spirals


There is No refunds, make ups or credits for missed classes.
